actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to distribute seeds and plants for use in home gardens.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to distribute, upon request and without cost, seeds and plants for use in home gardens to produce food for the personal consumption of the household. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to distribute seeds and plants for use in home gardens.
